name: Accelerated Designs PCB Library File
summary: Electronics data file created in Accelerated Designs' BXL format (referred to as the Xlator DataBase format); can specify both PCB footprints and schematic symbols; used for distributing PCB information in a vendor neutral format.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Accelerated Designs Ultra Librarian Free Reader
